user.title: MQTT Hoymiles integration
user.description: If you need help with the configuration have a look here: https://github.com/wasilukm/hoymiles-mqtt-integration

data.--mqtt-tls-insecure: Allow TLS insecure connection (only relevant when enabled the above TLS connection)

abort.single_instance_allowed: Only a single instance is allowed.

data.--query-period: How often (in seconds) DTU shall be queried
data.--mi-entities: Inverter entities that will be sent to MQTT
data.--port-entities: Port entities (in fact PV panel entities) that will be sent to MQTT
data.--expire-after: Number of seconds after which DTU or inverter entities expire
data.--comm-retries: Modbus max number of retries per request
data.--comm-reconnect-delay: Modbus minimum delay in seconds.milliseconds before reconnecting
data.--comm-reconnect-delay-max: Modbus maximum delay in seconds.milliseconds before reconnecting
